text: ya 'ayuha aladhin sddaqu allah warasulah waeamiluu bshreh, arjieuu ean dhunubikum 'iilaa taeat allah rjwea la mesyt bedh, easaa rabukum 'an yamhu eankum sayiyaat aemalkm, wa'ana ydkhlkm janaat tajri min taht qswrha alanhar, yawm la yukhzi allah alnabia waladhin amanuu meh, wala yedhbhm, bal yuely shanhm, nur hwla' yasir 'amamahum wbaymanhm, yqwlwn: rabana 'atmim lana nurana hataa njwz alsrat, wnhtdy 'iilaa aljnt, waef enna watajawuz ean dhunubana wastrha elyna, 'iinak ealaa kl shay' qdyr
